title: Variables
summary: Variables store values that can be reused later. They act as named containers for data and allow programs to work with changing information.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful?

title: Loops
summary: Loops allow you to repeat a action multiple times. A 'for' loop iterates over a sequence, while a 'while' loop continues until a condition becomes false.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.
